text.tspan: On Accept error: if ctx.Done() return, else log and continue

svg.text: mount /buildinfo handler (build version and Go info as JSON)
wg.Add(1) - track connection for graceful shutdown
spawn graceful shutdown goroutine for connection
trim spaces and ignore empty entries
log error and exit connection loop
log error and exit connection loop
cancel context - signal all connections to stop
wg.Wait() - wait for all connections to complete
